page.title: 20A typical family weekend
page.content: My name is Charlotte. I am eight years old and I live on a farm which is just over the road from the school I go to. On Saturday morning, like every other day, my daddy is the first up. He has to go out at about seven o'clock to see what has to be done on the farm that day. I get up at about eight o'clock and I usually have coffee and cheese on toast for breakfast. Mum, Robert (my little brother) and I usually go into Alnwick to do the shopping on Saturday morning.In the afternoons we go to the rugby club.Some Saturdays I go hunting, if Granda is going. On alternate Sunday mornings we go to church at 11.00 a.m.After church I have a piano lesson because my teacher is the church organist. I enjoy Sunday dinner which is roast meat, potatoes and vegetables
